src:
Nenavadna nesreča: na cesti spregledala kravo in trčila vanjo
Voznica se je lažje poškodovala.
03 Nov 2019, 09:41 by A. L.
METLIKA – V soboto zvečer so metliški policisti obravnavali prometno nesrečo z udeležbo dveh vozil in krave.Po prvi zbranih obvestilih je voznica, ki je peljala iz Novega meta proti Metliki, spregledala ob desni strani vozišča hodečo kravo, vanjo trčila, nato pa jo je odbilo na drugo stran ceste, kjer je trčila v nasproti vozeče vozilo, v poročilu pišejo policisti PU Novo mesto.Voznica se je lažje poškodovala. Z reševalnim vozilom so jo odpeljali v novomeško bolnišnico.Za kravo, ki je našla pot iz poškodovane obore na cesto in je bila v nesreči lažje poškodovana, bodo poskrbeli lastniki.
text:
Unusual accident: overlooked a cow on the road and collided with it
The ticket was easily injured.
03 Nov 2019, 09:41 by A.L.
METLIKA - Police officers dealt with a traffic accident involving two vehicles and a cow on Saturday night. According to the first collected information, the driver who drove from Novi met to Metlika overlooked a walking cow on the right side of the car, collided with it and then bounced it. to the other side of the road, where she collided in a vehicle opposite, the police said in a report. An ambulance was taken to a hospital in Novo mesto. The cow, who found her way out of the damaged litter onto the road and was easily injured in the accident, will be taken care of by the owners.
